message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
Your turn Alice. How about a 55/45 split in my favor? Consider that the value decreases for you with each round.
I'll give you a bit more than before, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. 58-42 is my new offer.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm offering you 480,000.  Each round it's worth less and less to you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I can get a bit more. 56-44 is my new offer. Don't think I'll go much lower!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this 51/49 split or you risk getting even less. Time is running out!
